You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesR R] > &rfr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Rfr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/211c/index.htm U+0211C].
  * `&rfr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D52F.
